create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS books (Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Title TEXT (50) NOT NULL, Author TEXT (30) NOT NULL, Genre TEXT (30) NOT NULL, Year (30) INTEGER, ISBN TEXT UNIQUE);
insert: INSERT INTO books (Title, Author, Genre, Year, ISBN) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
update: UPDATE books SET Title = ?, Author = ?, Genre = ?, Year = ?, ISBN = ? WHERE Id = ?;
